PWAInstall.iosInstructions:
To install this app on your iOS device:
1. Tap the Share button (□↗)
2. Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
3. Tap "Add" to confirm
PWAInstall.androidInstructions:
To install this app on your Android device:
1. Tap the menu button (⋮)
2. Tap "Add to Home screen" or "Install app"
3. Follow the prompts to install
PWAInstall.desktopInstructions:
To install this app:
1. Look for an install icon in your browser address bar
2. Or go to browser menu > "Install Optimist"
3. Follow the prompts to install
